
Firstly , I train English every day with Englishtown , so that I can apply for the galleries only in English .
ENGLISH	V n	train English every day
APPLY	V for n	can apply for the galleries

In the morning I have meetings to discuss about the problems of the machines and after that I go to the office to read and write emails .
HAVE	V n	have meetings
HAVE	V n to v	have meetings to discuss
DISCUSS	V about n	discuss about the problems
GO	V to n	go to the office
WRITE	V n	read and write emails

To better explain you , I sent you three pictures .
EXPLAIN	V n	better explain you
SEND	V n	sent you three pictures

You will never get an opportunity like this . I urge you to apply this job !
GET	V n	will never get an opportunity
URGE	V n	urge you
URGE	V n to v	urge you to apply
APPLY	V n	apply this job

Let me tell you why you should apply to a zookeeper at Flossington Zoo .
TELL	V n	tell you
APPLY	V to n	should apply to a zookeeper

Since you would like an outdoor job , I want to encourage you to apply the zookeeper position .
LIKE	V n	would like an outdoor job
WANT	V to v	want to encourage
ENCOURAGE	V n	encourage you
ENCOURAGE	V n to v	encourage you to apply
APPLY	V n	apply the zookeeper position

I want to encourage you to apply this position , sure you 'll enjoy it !
WANT	V to v	want to encourage
ENCOURAGE	V n	encourage you
ENCOURAGE	V n to v	encourage you to apply
APPLY	V n	apply this position
ENJOY	V n	'll enjoy it

I really encourage you to apply to this position .
ENCOURAGE	V n	encourage you
ENCOURAGE	V n to v	encourage you to apply
APPLY	V to n	apply to this position

I urge you to apply this job because it suits your expectations .
URGE	V n	urge you
URGE	V n to v	urge you to apply
APPLY	V n	apply this job
SUIT	V n	suits your expectations

I am a hardworking , motivated person , and I need an opportunity to explain about it .
BE	V n	am a hardworking
MOTIVATE	V n	motivated person
NEED	V n	need an opportunity
NEED	V n to v	need an opportunity to explain
EXPLAIN	V about n	explain about it

I think they could make a meet with everyone to discuss about the company goals .
THINK	V n	think they
THINK	V n v n	think they could make a meet
MAKE	V n	could make a meet
DISCUSS	V about n	discuss about the company goals

We checked the car again and explained the owner that it was an old car that was not in a good condition .
CHECK	V n	checked the car
EXPLAIN	V n	explained the owner
EXPLAIN	V n that	explained the owner that
BE	V n	was an old car that
BE	V n v-ed	was an old car that was
BE	V adv	was not

- What kind of circumstances do we have to discuss about it ?
DO	V n	do we
HAVE	V to v	have to discuss
DISCUSS	V about n	discuss about it

After that , I want to encourage you to apply this job .
WANT	V to v	want to encourage
ENCOURAGE	V n	encourage you
ENCOURAGE	V n to v	encourage you to apply
APPLY	V n	apply this job

We went to a steakhouse restaurant and discussed about our future relationship .
GO	V to n	went to a steakhouse restaurant
DISCUSS	V about n	discussed about our future relationship

So I 'm applying to this .
APPLY	V to n	'm applying to this

I think this movie can apply for to Oscar .
THINK	V n	think this movie
APPLY	V to n	can apply for to Oscar

In this meeting they discussed about the budget for the next year .
DISCUSS	V about n	discussed about the budget

We primarily discussed about ocean shipping developing tendency of the inland market .
DISCUSS	V about n	discussed about ocean shipping
DEVELOP	V n	developing tendency

In the last meeting , we discussed about the quality assessment of our department .
DISCUSS	V about n	discussed about the quality assessment

We can see a lot of international conferences that have been discussing about the environment quality .
SEE	V n	can see a lot
DISCUSS	V about n	have been discussing about the environment quality

I like to get together with my friends to discuss about these things and to visit exhibitions .
LIKE	V to v	like to get
GET	V adv	get together
DISCUSS	V about n	discuss about these things
VISIT	V n	visit exhibitions

I asked him , why they bought not much this season , there was a problem , and he explained me , that they found it a bit expensive for them .
ASK	V n	asked him
BUY	V adv	bought not much
BE	V n	was a problem
EXPLAIN	V n	explained me
FIND	V n n	found it a bit

To get this dream , I am going to apply to the master 's program in hotel management .
GET	V n	get this dream
GO	V to v	am going to apply
APPLY	V to n	apply to the master 's program

I will answer of your mail about the TV survey .
ANSWER	V of n	will answer of your mail

I will try to answer to your questions in a more detailed way .
TRY	V to v	will try to answer
ANSWER	V to n	answer to your questions

I answer about your questions .
ANSWER	V about n	answer about your questions

Finally , if your choice is truth , you will answer about a personal question .
BE	V adj	is truth
ANSWER	V about n	will answer about a personal question

All parents are invited to answer to the invitation before Wednesday .
INVITE	V to v	are invited to answer
ANSWER	V to n	answer to the invitation
